title: A proclamation against exportation, and buying and selling of gold and silver at higher rates then in our mint as also against culling, washing, or otherwise diminishing our current moneys.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
At head of title: By the King.
At end of text: Given at our court at Whitehall, the tenth day of June, in the thirteenth year of our reign, 1661.
